title: Update hero background artwork (moon + waterfall + volcano + sun)

requirements.summary: Add the newly generated moon/waterfall + volcano/sun hero background image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
The image visually includes: (1) moon-themed side with a waterfall, (2) opposite side with a volcano and the sun.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static hero background image asset (Epic anime-style landscape with moonlit waterfall on one side and volcano with bright sun on the other), to be served directly from the frontend as a static file.

requirements.summary: Update the Hero section to use the newly generated background image while preserving full-screen cover behavior and overlay readability.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx references the new generated image path in its backgroundImage style.
The hero remains full-screen with the background covering the section (no tiling) and the text remains readable with the existing overlay.

file_operations.description: Replace the current backgroundImage reference (/assets/generated/anime-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) with /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png while keeping the existing backgroundSize/backgroundPosition/backgroundRepeat and the overlay for text readability.
